an5.253:0.3: 253. Who Should Have a Novice as Attendant
an5.253:1.1: “Mendicants, a novice should attend on a mendicant with five qualities.
an5.253:1.3: It’s a mendicant who has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.253:1.4: A novice should attend on a mendicant with these five qualities.”
